mapper.select: select sum(DISQUA_AMT_RMB) rmb,substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK where substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) in ('11','12','21','22','31','32','33','41','42','51') group by substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) ;

select sum(DISQUA_AMT_RMB) rmb,substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2) dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK where substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2) in ('61','62','63','69','99') group by substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2);
select sum(DISQUA_AMT_RMB) rmb, DISQUA_CONT_CODES dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK where DISQUA_CONT_CODES in ('61','62','63','69','99') group by DISQUA_CONT_CODES;

select sum(DISQUA_AMT_RMB) rmb,substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK where substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) in ('11','12','21','22','31','32','33','41','42','51') group by substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2);

select sum(DISQUA_AMT_RMB) rmb,substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2) dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK where substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2) in ('61','62','63','69','99') group by substr(DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2);
select sum(DISQUA_AMT_RMB) rmb, DISQUA_CONT_CODES dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK where DISQUA_CONT_CODES in ('61','62','63','69','99') group by DISQUA_CONT_CODES;

select count(distinct a.DECL_REG_NO) qysm,substr(b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK b left join eciq_gdata.ITF_DCL_IO_DECL@ECIQ_LINK a on a.DECL_NO=b.DECL_NO where substr(b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) in ('11','12','21','22','31','32','33','41','42','51') group by substr(b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES,1,2) ;

select count(distinct a.DECL_REG_NO) qysm, substr(b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2) dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK b left join eciq_gdata.ITF_DCL_IO_DECL@ECIQ_LINK a on a.DECL_NO=b.DECL_NO where substr(b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2) in ('61','62','63','69','99') group by substr(b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES,4,2);

select count(distinct a.DECL_REG_NO) qysm,b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES dm from eciq_gdata.ITF_INS_RESULT_GOODS@ECIQ_LINK b left join eciq_gdata.ITF_DCL_IO_DECL@ECIQ_LINK a on b.DECL_NO =a.DECL_NO where b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES in ('61','62','63','69','99') group by b.DISQUA_CONT_CODES;
